title: Sparkie
description: Children's or boys' paper. The main character in this design is Sparkie, a puppet who thinks he's a real boy, playing the role of assorted American heroes including George Washington, Benjamin Franklin and Sitting Bull.  He is shown in Indian costume seated before a teepee, on horseback riding through town, and hunting buffalo. Printed in green, gold, red and brown with blue on an off-white ground.
name: Sidewall
